name: setinds2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- w0
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), w1), w0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), w1), w0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- w0
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), w1), w0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: ` _E ` induction schema, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 10-Mar-2011.)
